JScience 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
  1. org.jscience.measure
  2. Unit

Uses of Interface
org.jscience.measure.Unit

Packages that use Unit
Package
Description
org.jscience.measure
package implements a comprehensive units framework enabling type-safe dimensional analysis at compile time.
org.jscience.measure.adapters
 
org.jscience.measure.metrology
package implements the science of measurement following ISO/IEC Guide 98-3 (Guide to the Expression of Uncertainty in Measurement - GUM).
org.jscience.measure.units
 
org.jscience.physics
package covers: Classical Mechanics (Kinematics, Dynamics, N-Body) Quantum Mechanics (Process descriptions, Circuits) Astronomy and Astrophysics Thermodynamics and Statistical Mechanics Electromagnetism
org.jscience.ui.devices
package provides JavaFX-based visual representations of physical measurement instruments like oscilloscopes, thermometers, and pressure gauges.
